spell.name: Deeper Stratagem
spell.description: You may have a maximum of 6 combo points, your finishing moves consume up to 6 combo points, and your finishing moves deal 10% increased damage.

spell.name: Grappling Hook
spell.description: Launch a grappling hook and pull yourself to the target location.

spec.name: Outlaw
spec.description: A ruthless fugitive who uses agility and guile to stand toe-to-toe with enemies.

spell.name: Dirty Tricks
spell.description: Gouge, Blind, Cheap Shot, and Sap no longer cost Energy.

spec.name: Outlaw
spec.description: A ruthless fugitive who uses agility and guile to stand toe-to-toe with enemies.

spell.name: Marked for Death
spell.description: Marks the target, instantly generating 5 combo points. Cooldown reset if the target dies within 1 min.

spell.name: Iron Stomach
spell.description: Increases the healing you receive from Crimson Vial, healing potions, and healthstones by 30%.

spec.name: Outlaw
spec.description: A ruthless fugitive who uses agility and guile to stand toe-to-toe with enemies.

spell.name: Cannonball Barrage
spell.description: Command a ghost ship crew to barrage the target area with cannonballs doing 146,934 Physical damage over 1.8 sec and slowing enemies by 50% for 1.5 sec.

spec.name: Outlaw
spec.description: A ruthless fugitive who uses agility and guile to stand toe-to-toe with enemies.

spell.name: Ghostly Strike
spell.description:
Strikes an enemy with your cursed weapon, dealing 36,702 Physical damage and causing the target to take 10% increased damage from your abilities for 15 sec.



Awards 1 combo point.

spell.name: Master of Subtlety
spell.description: Attacks made while stealthed and for 6 seconds after breaking stealth cause an additional 10% damage.

spec.name: Subtlety
spec.description: A dark stalker who leaps from the shadows to ambush his unsuspecting prey.

spell.name: Subterfuge
spell.description:
Your abilities requiring Stealth can still be used for 3 sec after Stealth breaks.



Also causes Garrote to deal 100% increased damage and have no cooldown when used from Stealth or 3 sec after Stealth breaks.

spell.name: Vigor
spell.description: Increases your maximum Energy by 50 and your Energy regeneration by 10%.

spell.name: Soothing Darkness
spell.description: You heal 3% of your maximum life every 1 sec while Stealth is active.

spec.name: Subtlety
spec.description: A dark stalker who leaps from the shadows to ambush his unsuspecting prey.

spell.name: Master of Shadows
spell.description: You immediately gain 30 Energy when you enter Stealth or activate Shadow Dance.

spec.description: A dark stalker who leaps from the shadows to ambush his unsuspecting prey.

spell.name: Premeditation
spell.description: Cheap Shot and Shadowstrike generate 1 additional combo point.

spec.description: A dark stalker who leaps from the shadows to ambush his unsuspecting prey.

spell.name: Strike from the Shadows
spell.description: Shadowstrike also stuns your target for 2 sec. Players are Dazed for 5 sec instead.

spell.name: Hemorrhage
spell.description:
